video_title: How To Build An Audience From Scratch | Yung Pueblo

content_profile.title: How To Build An Audience From Scratch | Yung Pueblo

key_takeaways: Solution: Spend years developing authentic voice and content without monetization focus (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Leverage existing audience to promote portfolio companies (Channel: community)
Growth Tactic: Share pieces of book content on social media to test audience understanding (Channel: content)
Strategy: Multi-platform business empire: audience building + book publishing + venture capital
Strategy: Self-publish first to test market before traditional publishing
